column2: We are looking for Law graduates to join the In-House legal team on immediate basisJob description Legal Title Due Diligence and Title Search Report preparation. Online Property, Encumbrances/registration details and Document Search on Official Government / Sub Registrar Office (SRO) Websites. Development of legal policies and procedures for the Company designed to achieve and ensure compliance with regulatory requirements. Drafting and vetting of Letter Of Intent, Memorandum of Understanding, Lease / License Agreements, Legal Notices and other ancillary legal document Research on Bye-laws, practices and documentation of Development Authorities at Pan India Level on case to case assignment. Research on Case Laws and Case studies based on Securitization.Preference : Candidates should know how to read and write vernacular languages like Tamil and Kanada along with English and Telugu. Experience in the provisions of Transfer of Property Act, Registration Act, Companies Act., SARFAESI Act, TPA, Banking Finance and Laws related to Finance Industry. Experience in Legal Process outsourcing and Knowledge Process outsourcing.Location :Hyderabad (Base Location), Work from Home option is available.Salary :Company will offer a trainee-ship period of 3 months with a stipend of Rs.15,000/- pm and based upon the performance of the trainee, he /she will be taken on the Company's payroll with CTC - Rs. 3 Lacs per annum and also offer performance-based monthly incentives.Interview Mode: Telephonic /VCInterested Candidates can drop their CVs to the Mail id Given below patala.nikitha@iiflhomeloans.com [Whatsapp -9321274312]Strictly LLB, Law Candidates can be preferred- Do not disturb on calls.

column2: As an assistant business manager, your primary responsibility is to support the business manager or executive in their day-to-day operations and decision-making processes. Your role involves a wide range of administrative, organizational, and managerial tasks including supply chain operations and data visualization and analytics.Administrative Support: Provide administrative assistance to the business manager, including managing calendars, scheduling meetings, coordinating travel arrangements, and handling correspondence.Communication: Serve as a liaison between the business manager and other departments, clients, and stakeholders. Draft and distribute internal and external communications, including memos, emails, reports, and presentations.Data Management: Collect, organize, and analyze data to support decision-making. Prepare reports, charts, and spreadsheets to present data and key performance indicators to the business manager..Good data analytical skills Must have experience in assisting senior profile   Requirements:Bachelor's degree in business administration, management, or a related field (or equivalent experience).Strong organizational and multitasking skills.Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities.Proficiency in (at least two) SAP SD, Microsoft EXCEL, Power BI, Tableau, Google Data Studio, Python3+ years of experience in same profileThose who are willing to relocate to Ernakulam / Cochin can also applyAttention to detail and ability to work independently.Analytical and problem-solving skills.JOB LOCATION- ERNAKULAM/COCHIN, KERALA

column2: Key responsibilities:1. New 3rd party yardsa. Identification as per business requirements b. Preparing case for approvalc. Negotiation of parking charges (as per standard rates), signing agreement and onboardingd. Training of the new yard personnel on process + tech solution / app usage 2. Audit the 3rd party yards (as per plan) for the following:a. Check physical stock and highlight any discrepancy w.r.t ERP data and YMSb. If any vehicles have been Sold or released, then check release order for any discrepancies. c. Vehicles to be audited as random check for condition / maintenance and assess discrepancy w.r.t the condition it was brought into the yard in (as per YMS) and the current state of the vehicled. Visitor register availability with latest entrye. Refer to Last Audit feedback report and note how the yard has fared against the discrepancies found / feedback give3.Infrastructure check:i. CCTV in running condition covering all parts (Front, Back Yard, vehicle standing area etc.)ii. Fire Extinguisher (numbers and date of validity)iii. Segregated parking for HLF vehicles / other financier vehicles (in lots)iv. Boundary walls with proper fencing and security gate intact  whether the assets are secure4.Monitor the quality of information being entered by the yard personnel (data and pictures) and give feedback on the same to the yard personal.5. Regular training of the 3rd party yard personnel (new / existing)6. Inventory reconciliation / matching  once per month (internal); once per quarter (external)7. Coordinate proactively for auctions scheduled / closures / buyer visits etc (before, during and after the auctions) at the allocated yards8. Coordinate and ensure that auctions are happening with proper preparation and as per defined SOPs at the allocated yards9. Coordinate with clients / repo agents (onboarded / clients) for any issues related to vehicle inward / parking / outward etc 10.Coordinate with evaluators for any issues related to inspections11.Monitor the inventory status of 3rd party yards (for HLF / external clients vehicles):a. Inwardb. Inventory status (number and ageing)c. Outwardd. Regular inventory status update to clients12.New buyer identification and onboarding (in the area / state of operation)
column13: Logistics Operations, Warehouse Management, Outbound Logistics, Dispatch, Supply Chain Operations, Warehouse Operations

column2: Role & responsibilities  ??The objective is to provide our clients with a best-in-class experience by delivering a comprehensive,  digitally enabled suite of Trade and Supply Chain Finance(SCF) solutions. This is a unique opportunity  to help lead an expanding team with one of Indias largest and most respected corporate brand. To  enable growth in SCF Business by identifying potential clients through self-sourcing, target market  technique and referral networks. ??Responsible for deal origination, structuring, sanction & disbursements of SCF products to  large/medium corporate clients having a turnover of more than 500 crores. ??Understand clients business model, payment cycle, vendor & sales management operations and  provide them with the right kind of structured SCF solution. ??Developing and managing relationships with CFO/Treasury Heads of large corporates and exploring  financing opportunities with them with respect to SCF business. Position: Relationship Manager Reports To: National Head  Sales (Supply Chain Finance) Location: Colaba, Mumbai No. of positions: 2 Essential  Experience: Candidate should have 4-10 years  experience in Banking/Financing  domain, preferably in SCF Business,  and eager to explore beyond  traditional banking and enter new  age financial market. Qualification: Graduate/Postgraduate in  Marketing/Finance Website: https://www.shapoorjipallonjifinance.com/ 26-Feb-24 ??Ensure growth in book size by extracting Vendor database from Anchors, onboarding the suppliers,  and increase the utilization of limits. ??Work in co-ordination with various internal stake holders such as Credit, Operations, Legal &  Compliance Teams and ensure satisfactory resolution of client?? queries and quality customer service. ??Maintaining Portfolio Hygiene and ensuring overall Portfolio health. Manage and service existing  portfolio of SCF clients including renewal and enhancement of limits. ??Coordinating for execution of documentation and sanction of loan proposals with credit team. ??Coordinating disbursements or any client requirements with Operations team. ??To follow defined process & improve upon them to optimize operations. Interested can share your resume at Kaustubh@hrworksindia.com
column13: Supply Chain Finance, BD, Finance, Relationship Management, Sales Development, Business Development, Relationship manager
